|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] F1C100s @408MHz :SoC: ARM (926EJS) *Storage: 16MB (NOR) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 32MB (DDR) integrated *Wi-Fi: [[Espressif]] ESP8089 (802.11bgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port ==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.sipeed.com/hardware/en/lichee/Nano/Nano.html ''Lichee Nano'' on '''SiPEED''' Wiki] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/LicheePi_Nano ''LicheePi Nano'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/08/17/licheepi-nano-cheap-sd-card-sized-linux-board/ ''LicheePi Nano is an SD Card Sized Linux Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Lichee Pi Nano Top.jpeg|Board top File:Lichee Pi Nano Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== ===Models=== :;[https://wiki.sipeed.com/hardware/zh/ Hardware] *[[Lichee RV D1]] *[[Lichee RV Dock]] *[[Lichee Pi Nano]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero (Gen 2)]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero Plus]] 
Model	Lichee RV D1	Lichee Pi Zero Plus	Lichee Pi Zero	 Lichee Pi Nano
SoC	Allwinner D1	Allwinner S3		Allwinner V3s	 Allwinner F1C100s
CPU	C906		ARM (Cortex-A7)		ARM (Cortex-A7)	 ARM (926EJS)
Freq	1.0GHz		1.2GHz			1.2GHz (max)	 600MHz (max)
RAM	512MB DDR3	128MB DDR3		64MB DRAM	 32MB DDR
Flash	SD NAND		SD NAND,SPI NOR,eMMC 	SPI SOP8 	 16MB NOR
